reviews.review_msg: She just rants every class. Often times she will say one thing in one lecture and another thing in another lecture giving conflicting information. Gets pissed off when asked to clarify. I have learned nothing at all in this class. It's just adult daycare, for both us and her. There is no value here, only busywork. I deeply regret taking this course

Azadeh is the most unprofessional professor I've had. She is consistently unprepared. Feels like she's just making it up as she goes. Often times I wonder if she's intoxicated during lectures. She is combative, catty and bitter and should quit but won't because the bar is so low and the pay is good. All I learned is that lit courses are a circus.
When students share their opinions, she always disagree. Makes the class very hard to take.Grading  criteria is not clear as well. Does not give good feedback.

I don't know what the bad reviews are about, because she's a great prof who provides a lot of feedback if you approach her for it. Granted, she is more used to teaching upper level courses so to get a good grade you need to learn how to critically engage with readings. Definitely learned a lot from her!
Azadeh is one of SFU's best profs! She's funny, caring, and makes every lecture super fun and interesting. Definitely recommend taking any of her classes - she's awesome!!

This professor was difficult to reach and her expectations were very unclear. She was unprepared for lectures, and did not seem to care about whether her students were succeeding in the course or not. She asked not to be reached via email, but then did not give out her office hours. If you can avoid taking this class by her you should.
Do not take her course. Very terrible. She doesn't give useful feedback. Grading criteria are not clear.
I've never had a class with such beautifully interconnected readings. Her lectures both critically engage texts and draw context around them, her class is one of the best i've ever taken.

Azadeh expects a lot out of her students and is not an easy marker by any means. However, she is an amazing professor with a hilarious personality. The course material was interesting and she was flexible with deadlines. If you take her class, be prepared to receive exactly what you've worked for. Last minute paper writing won't fly with her.

She is the example of what a true Professor is like! You learn so much from her and if she knows that you are actually working hard and participating in discussions because you want to get something from the class, she will be there for you. She was always available for help outside of the class and her office hours are productive.

This class is a requirement for a World Literature major. You forced to take this class with this instructor. I would suggest waiting as long as possible before taking it. The instructor's discussion is painful tangential. The class is too difficult for what it actually is.
Love her, she's super funny and her classes are so enjoyable, but she expects a lot from you and won't give an easy A to anyone... and don't get on her bad side
Not available to reach, did not respond to emails, gavee little to no feedback on testsworks. Class reading focuses primarily on Nietzsche.

She is an excellent prof! Very passionate about what she teaches! Tries to make lectures interesting despite the material being a bit dry! If you pay attention, take good notes, and work hard on the take home essays - you'll do great! I loved her!

Really difficult for a 100 level course, don't expect this course to be a GPA booster or a breeze. But you'll definitely learn a lot and she's super encouraging and helpful. She teaches really good writing skills, and it's definitely a hard class but so definitely worth it!
Very nice personality, generally very chill and the class itself is a lot of fun. however there is a lot of work to be done, and she can be very picky about how you write.

One of the best (if not the best) Professors I've ever had. I've taken multiple courses with her and she is just amazing. Cares about her students, wants everyone to do well and is extremely helpful. She's all about her students! If only all teachers could be like her! Don't think twice about enrolling in her class...just do it!
Amazing Prof! So much fun, chiller, very helpful! I loved this class. Easy A.
